subject: Problem with JUnit and dll
authorName: Jefferson Rodrigues de Oliveira e Silva
msgSnippet: Hi, I have a class that creates an object. This object loads a .dll. This works. But when I created a test class in JUnit, the load of library failed. My
messageBody:
Hi,

I have a class that creates an object. This object loads a .dll. This works.

But when I created a test class in JUnit, the load of library failed. My object is not able to find the .dll anymore, even if I insert in the build.xml the following :

<jvmarg value="-Djava.library.path=... />

I'm using JUnit inside cruise control.

Can anyone help me on this ?

Thanks,
Jefferson


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
